author: LinOnetwo
description: Auto generate input form on a tiddler by simply adding a SuperTag to it. Create a SuperTag by compositing existing TraitTags.
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/UnderTiddler":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/UnderTiddler","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"<$let thisCurrentTiddler=<<currentTiddler>> > 
  <!--
    Filter to find if current tiddler added a SuperTag
    all[current] - tiddler
    tags[] - SuperTag and other tags
    tags[] - TraitTag and other tags
    tags[] - $:/SuperTag/TraitTag and other tags
  -->
  <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]tags[]tags[]match[$:/SuperTag/TraitTag]then<thisCurrentTiddler>]">

    <$supertag-form />
    <!-- <$json-editor-form filter="[all[current]debug-log[]tags[]tags[]] :filter[tags[]match[$:/SuperTag/TraitTag]] :and[get[schema]]" tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> /> -->

  </$list>
</$let>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/config","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","caption":"<<lingo "Name" "$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/">>","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/

<<lingo ConfigDescription>>

---

!! <<lingo PluginConfigs>>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/Readme","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/

! <<lingo Name>>

<<lingo Description>>


See following resources to learn how to use:

* "Talk" forum post [[SuperTag plugin, auto-generate a field editor on view template|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/supertag-plugin-auto-generate-a-field-editor-on-view-template/6245]]
* Demo site [[SuperTag plugin's demo site|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/super-tag/]]
* Github: [[https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag]]
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/Name","text":"SuperTag"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/Description","text":"Auto generate input form on a tiddler by simply adding a SuperTag to it. Create a SuperTag by compositing existing TraitTags."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/PluginConfigs":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/PluginConfigs","text":"Plugin Configs"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/ConfigDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/en-GB/ConfigDescription","text":"These settings let you customise the behaviour of SuperTag plugin."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/Readme","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/

! <<lingo Name>>

<<lingo Description>>

请参阅以下资源，了解如何使用：

* 论坛帖子[[SuperTag插件，在视图模板上自动生成一个字段编辑器|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/supertag-plugin-auto-generate-a-field-editor-on-view-template/6245]]
* 演示网站 [[SuperTag插件的演示网站|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/super-tag/]]
* Github: [[https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag]]
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"超级标签"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"只需在条目上添加一个超级标签，就能自动生成输入表单。通过合成现有的特性标签来创建超级标签。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/PluginConfigs":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/PluginConfigs","text":"插件设置"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/ConfigDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/zh-Hans/ConfigDescription","text":"通过这些设置，您可以自定义「超级标签」插件的行为。"},"$:/core/macros/lingo":{"title":"$:/core/macros/lingo","tags":"$:/tags/Global","text":"<!-- //TODO: remove after https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/pull/7821 is merged -->
<!-- Note that lingo-base should end with a trailing slash character -->
\procedure lingo-base()
$:/language/
\end lingo-base

\procedure lingo(title,override-lingo-base)
<!-- Lingo procedure -->
<!-- Get the parse mode used to invoke this procedure -->
<$parameters $parseMode="parseMode">
	<!-- Compute the lingo-base-->
	<$let active-lingo-base={{{ [<override-lingo-base>!match[]else<lingo-base>] }}}>
		<!-- First try the old school <active-lingo-base><title> format -->
		<$transclude $tiddler={{{ [<active-lingo-base>addsuffix<title>] }}} $mode=<<parseMode>>>
			<!-- If that didn't work, try the new <lingo-base><langcode>/<title> format -->
			<$let language-code={{{  [[$:/language]get[text]get[name]else[en-GB]] }}}>
        <$transclude $tiddler={{{ [<active-lingo-base>addsuffix<language-code>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<title>] }}} $mode=<<parseMode>>/>
			</$let>
		</$transclude>
	</$let>
</$parameters>
\end lingo"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/readme","creator":"LinOnetwo","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/language/

<<lingo Readme>>

button.btn.btn-primary {
  background: <<colour button-background>>;
  border-color:<<colour button-border>>;
  color: <<colour button-foreground>>;
}
button.btn.btn-primary:hover, button.btn.btn-primary:active, button.btn.btn-primary:focus {
	background-color: <<colour button-background-hover>>;
  border-color:<<colour button-border>>;
  color: <<colour button-foreground>>;
}
